Проактивного Проектного менеджера по продажам, который усилит нашу команду и поможет нам расширять присутствие на рынке, развивая долгосрочные отношения с архитекторами, дизайнерами и генподрядчиками.

We are a remote SaaS company with a mission to provide online anonymity to people worldwide. With a rich history in the Hosting and Networking domain, we've been operating in the anonymity space since 2008, serving thousands of active clients. With a clear vision for the future, our remote, passionate, and diverse team is continuously expanding, and we are on the lookout for talented individuals to join us on our exciting journey.

Excellence in everything we do (“I go above and beyond”)
Ownership and responsibility (“I own it”)
Continuously push the limits (“I don’t accept no as an answer. No is just an option”)
Openness & cooperation (“Everyone matters”)

About the Role:

We are looking for a detail-oriented, proactive problem solver who ensures financial accuracy, compliance, and drives business decisions with actionable financial insights. As an accountant you’ll be responsible for preparing timely financial reports, maintaining regulatory compliance, and optimizing financial processes across multiple entities, ensuring the company’s financial health and transparency.

What you’ll be responsible for:

Financial Reporting: Prepare accurate and compliant financial accounts, including income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements for all entities.
Internal Controls: Implement controls to prevent fraud, mismanagement, and financial discrepancies.
Decision Support: Provide actionable financial insights, dashboards and reports to management for strategic decision-making.
Accounts Payable Management: Ensure company invoices are paid reliably, with proper controls and accountability.
Regulatory Compliance & Ethics: Maintain adherence to corporate tax laws, VAT, payroll taxes, and all relevant regulations.
Process Optimization: Identify opportunities to automate and streamline financial processes for greater efficiency.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work with HR, sales, operations, and leadership to align financial goals.
Financial Strategy: Advise on investment decisions, cost control, and business expansion strategies.

You’ll be a great fit if you have:

At least 5+ years of experience in the accounting/finance field.
Prior experience with Amazon/eCommerce accounting and SaaS accounting.
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or Economics (CPA, CMA, or ACCA certification is a plus).
Ability to prepare, analyze, and interpret financial statements (balance sheet, income statement, cash flow).
Strong knowledge of GAAP, IFRS, or local accounting standards.
Understanding of corporate tax laws, VAT, payroll taxes, and regulatory filings.
Ability to ensure compliance and detect financial discrepancies through audits.
Understanding of cost structures, profitability analysis, and expense control.
Experience with QuickBooks, Xero, SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics, or other financial management tools.
Ability to use Excel, Power BI, or financial modeling tools to assess business performance.
An eye for detail to precisely manage transactions, reconciliations, and reports.
Strong organizational skills to handle multiple financial tasks without errors.
Proactivness & motivation to go beyond reporting numbers, providing actionable insights to drive decisions.
Problem-Solving skills to identify inefficiencies, financial risks, and cost-saving opportunities.
Adaptability to stay current with changes in tax laws, compliance regulations, and financial technology.

What’s in it for you:

Remote Work: Enjoy the flexibility of working 100% remotely from the comfort of your home or any location worldwide.
Unlimited Vacation: Take as many vacation days as you need to ensure you are well-rested and ready to tackle new challenges.
Professional Growth: As we are a small company, you'll have the chance to engage with various aspects of the business, fostering your professional development.
Emergency Fund: We offer an interest-free emergency fund with comfortable payouts to help you in times of need.
Company Retreats: While we are a fully remote company, we believe in teamwork and we want you to feel you belong here. We strive to organize yearly company retreats where everyone is invited. We believe in hard work, but also in having a good time!

Interview flow:

Application: Everything starts with getting in touch. The best way to express your interest is by applying online.
HR Interview: If your profile aligns with our requirements, we'll invite you for an HR interview.
Online Interview: You may have up to three online interviews with various team members.
Reference Check: We will kindly request you to arrange a reference check before we extend a job offer.

If this opportunity resonates with you, we are excited to meet you and welcome you to the RapidSeedbox team!
